# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_CRYPTO_TEST_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_executable(minecpp_crypto_test)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_crypto_test PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_crypto_test
        LINK_PUBLIC
        LINK_PRIVATE
        gtest
        gtest_main
        minecpp_crypto
)

add_test(NAME minecpp_crypto COMMAND minecpp_crypto_test)

configure_file("key.pem" "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/library/crypto/test/key.pem" COPYONLY)
